message.content: {"id": "112458", "title": "Property Editor displays layout item properties when switching to Master Page Viewer", "description": "When switching to the Master Page Viewer, the Property Editor is still displaying the properties of layout items. This behavior is incorrect as the Property Editor should only show the properties relevant to the selected item in the Master Page Viewer.", "OB": "The Property Editor should only show the properties of the selected item in the Master Page Viewer.", "EB": "The Property Editor is showing the properties of all layout items instead of only the selected item in the Master Page Viewer.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue:1. Create a new report and insert a label.2. Select the label. (The Property Editor should show only the label's properties)3. Switch to the Master Page Viewer. The Property Editor should update to only show the properties of the selected item in the Master Page Viewer."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
